channel.title: PI thieving rep++
channel.description:
hey i used to do delta but now i just started at PI and i want to change the money u get from stealing from a stall
in delta i just easely searshed the object id or 5000 :s but here it wont find
so what i have to do , now if you thief the stall u get 5 k i want to make it 20 k
help me out and get rep++

item.title: PI thieving rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

I Vain I:

Make sure you compile and restart the server, and make sure you’re stealing from stall 2561.

i did 2561 is the rite stall
i compiled 3 times
restarted server 3 times
no change :s

anyways still rep++

Read full topic

item.title: PI thieving rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]c.getThieving().stealFromStall(ITEM_TO_GET, AMOUNT_OF_ITEM, XP_GIVEN, LEVEL_NEEDED);

That’s the syntax.[/quote]
aah i see but then there is still the problem that it doesnt give 20 k but it still gives 5 k

case 2561: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 5000, 10, 1);
this was it before and i changed that 5 k to 20 k and it still gives 5 k :s

Read full topic

item.title: PI thieving rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Open your Thieving class.

Post the strealFromStall method.[/quote]

btw it still gives 5 k coins and not 20 k here is what i have there :S

public void firstClickObject(int objectType, int obX, int obY) { c.clickObjectType = 0; //c.sendMessage("Object type: " + objectType); switch(objectType) { case 2561: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 20000, 10, 1); break; case 2560: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 35000, 40, 40); break; case 2564: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 50000, 60, 60); break; case 2562: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 100000, 80, 80); break; case 9299:

and here is the stealfromstall method

[code] public void stealFromStall(int id, int amount, int xp, int level) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastThieve < 2500)
return;
if (Misc.random(30) == 0) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3105, 3495, 0);
c.sendMessage(“Thieving random.”);
return;
}
if (c.playerLevel[c.playerThieving] >= level) {
if (c.getItems().addItem(id, amount)) {
c.startAnimation(832);
c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerThieving);
c.lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.sendMessage(“You receive “+amount+” Coins”);

		}		
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("You must have a thieving level of " + level + " to thieve from this stall.");
	}
}
//npc, level, exp, coin amount
public int[][] npcThieving = {{1,1,8,200,1},{18,25,26,500,1},{9,40,47,1000,2},{26,55,85,1500,3},{20,70,152,2000,4},{21,80,273,3000,5}};

}[/code]

Read full topic

ty man that worked
any idea how to change xp rate to?

cant rep++ u but if u had lower then 200 i sure did
